key_themes: Technical exhaustion in late-stage momentum trades
Regulatory and guidance headwinds in financials/software

Geopolitical tensions unresolved (Ukraine, Taiwan escalation signals per RSS)
Regulatory tightening in banking/fintech impacting financial sector narratives
Cryptocurrency volatility and potential Bitcoin breakdown below support
Software sector guidance deterioration spreading beyond isolated names to sector-wide weakness
